title: EWL Passenger Incident - Tanjong Pagar (smoking power bank)

title_translations.zh-Hans: EWL 乘客事件 - 丹戎巴葛（充电宝冒烟）
title_translations.ms: EWL Insiden Penumpang - Tanjong Pagar (powerbank mengeluarkan asap)
title_translations.ta: EWL பயணிகள் சம்பவம் - Tanjong Pagar (பவர் பாங்க் புகை)

updates.text: Passengers were guided off a train at Tanjong Pagar MRT on the East-West Line (EWL) after a power bank emitted smoke; no details on service disruption or delays are provided.
